毢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sāi］
［《廣韻》蘇來切，平咍，心。］
见“毰毢”。

毢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毢； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页592第35
【玉篇】【廣韻】蘇來切【集韻】【正韻】桑才切，?音鰓。毰毢，鳥羽張貌。或从思作毸。【劉禹錫·鴟詩】毰毸飽腹蹲枯枝。　通作鰓。【潘岳·射雉賦】敷藻翰之陪鰓。【註】陪鰓，奮怒貌。○按鳥奮怒則羽張，與毰毸同義。

毢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毢字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毢; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 592 35
[Jade articles] [Guang Yun] Su Lai cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Sang Cai cut, sound gill.毰毢, Toba Zhang looks. Or think from thinking. 【Liu Yuxi·Xi'an Poem】毰毸 squat on dead branches with full stomach.　Through the gills. 【Pan Yue·Shooting Pheasant Fu】The accompany of the algae and the gills. [Note] Accompany the gills and look angry. ○According to the bird's anger, the feather will be Zhang, which is synonymous with 毰毸.
